website_summaries.verdict: The organic beeswax in this lip oil keeps lip color right where you want it, while the jojoba oil and peppermint oil moisturize your lips underneath.
pros: Blend of organic oils for the lips that helps to moisturize, prep, and prime
Beeswax, jojoba oil, and peppermint oil, plus other ingredients
Can also use as a gloss
cons: Do not leave in your car, or the oils may melt

customer_reviews.title: 4-Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special. I have plenty of lip products and this isn't really anything better than something you can get at CVS or Walmart. Sure, the ingredients may be organic and no chemicals but for the twenty-something dollars I paid... It really isn't worth it. It doesn't moisturize any better than plain coconut oil. Updated review 11/11/17 The more I have used this lip oil the more I’ve grown to like it. The glossiness it gives to lips is nice and my lips are smooth with it on. I think maybe I was to quick to judge with my original review. I actually think I may be repurchasing! Plus I want to try the anti-aging face oil too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not much product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality lip oil but there is not much product in the case. The design of the case is deceptive because it look like it has more lip balm than there really is,only about 1/4 inch of product in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Abundance

customer_reviews.title: Color does not stay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of the promise of the staying power of the color. It does not stay at all, maybe even less than my other lip products.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Burke

customer_reviews.title: lipstick tip broke off with first application
customer_reviews.text: I had read so many wonderful reviews about this product and ordered it for myself. You can imagine how disappointed I was to have it break on first usage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: spend your money on chapstick
customer_reviews.text: The marketing team should get an award. Really fell for this one. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cures extremely dry lips and works well with lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective lip balm I've found for extremely dry lips. Believe me--I have tried them all. I use the Ogee lip oil multiple times throughout the day. It coats my lips without feeling heavy. Unlike other lip balms, this works well with lipstick. I put it on before my lipstick and the color stays put. When my lips start to get dry, I put it on over my lipstick and it brings the color back to life. I cannot say enough good things about this product. I use a BiPAP machine at night (similar to a CPAP), and the constant blowing air makes my mouth and lips extremely dry. This product is definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: I’ve recommended this to all of my friends
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I wish I had found this product earlier because this lip oil saved my lips this winter. I live in Chicago and it was a rough winter, especially in January. With the extremely low temperatures and high winds, my lips were taking a beating and nothing was working. I saw someone advertise this on Instagram and figured I’d give it a chance. It is now a staple in my makeup routine for hydrating my lips. Just a little of the lip oil goes a long way. I’ve recommended this to all of my friends. Highly recommend this if you need some hydration for your lips.
customer_reviews.author: airazedy

customer_reviews.title: Love this Lip tint
customer_reviews.text: Love it, since it's organic, vegan and cruelty free especially! The color I ordered was the Linnea, it's a bit different than what I usually wear as far as color goes, but it's super pretty I get lots of compliments. Super softening, smooth and stays on w/ a few applications a day. Love it! Ready to order more colors now, going to try the Begonia & Camelia.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: save your money, don't buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would like my money back $26,00, saw this advertised on facebook, decided to buy on Amazon, says it does not bleed, well they are right on that, it does not bleed, because it does not even last 10 minutes on your lips, and the Begonia (mauve color supposedly is not mavey at all, more like a pinky orange) just give me my money back ok?) there is no lip oil, it is very dry!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: *blow a kiss
customer_reviews.text: My experience with your average lip balm has always made my lips more chapped then when I started. I personally put in on before sleep and first thing in the morning, all I need is an spf version...
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Costly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Midwest, and winters are brutal on skin, nails, lips, and hair. I have tried pretty much everything out there, including petroleum jelly, to keep my lips from being chapped, to no avail. I bought this on a wish and a prayer. The first night, I put it on before I went to bed, and in the morning, my lips were noticeably softer and smoother. The more I use it, the better it works!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S. Roman

customer_reviews.title: Calling it Lip "OIL" is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. By calling it Lip OIL Natural Lip Primer, MOISTURIZER & Treatment BALM it sounds like it will give you color as well as moisturize your lips. It is very drying to the lips. It goes on easy but is so drying that I had to put lip balm over it several times. It is a pretty color. They advertise that the color won't bleed and that is correct. It can't go anywhere because it so drying. If I hadn't thrown the box away I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth...but goes fast!
customer_reviews.text: This has such a smooth and silky feel going on, and really does make my lips soft! I really like the subtle mint flavor/scent, it's not at all over powering. It also gives my lips just a little bit of nice shine. The only negative is how quickly I ran out. I bought this originally at Christmas, and four months later am having to get a new one. I don't think that I use it excessively either...certainly not every single day. But, obviously I liked it enough to rebuy!
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I have very dry lips and every other thing I've tried gums up and gets sticky. This doesn't. It's a solid oil pencil that winds up from the bottom so you can use every bit of it. Only one complaint - It IS expensive, but I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Just get a vitamin E roller. It will save you a ton of cash and time.
customer_reviews.text: Dreadful. I used the entire thing, and my lips may of been drier afterwards. And DO NOT leave it in your car, they melt incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mcf119

customer_reviews.title: Love this lip color!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tinted lip oil! It's easy to apply and the color (I got Azalea) is a beautiful bold pink. The best part is that the product leaves a slight tint or stain on your lips as it wears off. It doesn't dry out my lips. I'll definitely be getting more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color and has some staying power, but make my lips SO dry. I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sisak

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.text: Didn't plump my lips, moisturize and lasted only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Polly026

customer_reviews.title: My lips thank me every time I use it
customer_reviews.text: This makes my lips feel like heaven! So soft and supple. I use it at night before bed, and I revel in the feeling of it. And when I wake in the morning my lips still feel soft as satin. I don't ever worry about cracked or dried out lips anymore. I do use a handy beeswax chapstick I carry around for windy or dry days, but most of the time this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Pittard

customer_reviews.title: Very Little Product, Not Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I liked this item because it was organic and cruelty free. Other than that, it is just an expensive lip balm that does not keep its promise of moisturizing dry lips. It also doesn’t last very long. There isn’t much product and it ran out after a month after only using it once a day or so. A Burt’s Bees organic chapstick lasts much, much longer and only costs about $3.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of the Lip product was very timely and efficient. The color of the lip oil is lighter that it showed on the video. I also haven't seen that it doesn't bleed into my lip lines. I'm going to keep using it to see if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Better than lip balm but not full color
customer_reviews.text: I like this product quite a bit. I was expecting more color. I find that I have to continuously apply to get even this deep a shade (pictured). The lip oil makes a great moisturizer so I find that I don't mind reapplying. However I don't expect the stick to last very long at the rate I am using it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Reap

customer_reviews.title: Pricey - but worth it to me!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Ogee purchase; as an older woman, I prefer the control of a pencil-type lip product. I really like the feel of this on my lips; the color has staying power, too. I will be back to try another color!
customer_reviews.author: Raymonda Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Loved product but
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product however it came out if the pencil and couldn't be put back in. Very disapointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING SPECIAL
customer_reviews.text: I expected my lips to appear more plump, pink, youthful glow, but silly me! $26 for a tube of light wear lip stick (not a stain) that wears off within 10 mins. Bought begonia, doesn't even resemble that floral color, or anything special. Does feel good on my lips I'll say. Save your money and buy 6 tubes of Wet and Wild. You'll get a better appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Newporter57Top Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Does not Bleed
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see it did not bleed as others guarantee, they won't either. The color Linnea was not dark enough for me with olive completion and dark hair. I read in some of the comments that this was a shimmery red color and I like the shimmery look. So, after a while I just added my favorite lipstick on top and was happy with the color. It had said, I could use as a base. I have reordered Begonia this time and I'm waiting for it to arrive to see how that color works out. It is very moist, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose N. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product seems like it could be good Feels good on the lips. Tbe problem is it kept breaking off in little pieces even if I lowered the dispenser. It is too soft for this type of use. Maybe of it is sold as a cream or balm in a container or little tub and applied with finger would work. I dont feel it is worth the price at all. I will not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa StClair-Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this , but I wish the color stayed on longer !!! I have two first was a pale color so I ordered a darker sill does not stay on long . You would think at this price it would last longer
customer_reviews.author: babyface

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lip oil and really liked the pink color, but it was totally gone in 5 minutes. I am not a lip biter and I applied it liberally. Also, I saw no plumping, as the product was promised to do. It is too expensive for what it does and does not do and I will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In for life ....👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Last thing before sleep.... reach over and put this all over my lips and the skin around my lips... In AM.... first after brushing teeth and rest of products. It’s so luscious ... almost decadent how lovely it feels and the obvious difference it’s making... I have full lips and don’t want any lines forming near my mouth.... looks like I’ll end up signing up for the monthly delivery, it’s THAT GOOD. Thanks for making a wonderful cruelty free product that is kind of like a magic wand... Cheers🤙🏼💋😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP off!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as you lick your lips, poof! no lipstick. this product is a ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: New go to lip balm!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite & go too lip balm! I ordered the Azalea and loved it so much, I ordered the Dehlia. It feels so good on your lips and it doesn’t feel over glossy like some. I also love that it does not feather!! Big plus. The colors are great for a balm and stay on!!! It’s almost like having a lipstick with the benefits of a balm!! I will be reordering for sure. I would have given 5 stars but the lid comes off easily in your purse. So I just keep them in a plastic baggie and all is good!!! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DSBryant

customer_reviews.title: Colors not true
customer_reviews.text: Have to put on forty coats to get near the color shown.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice lip product, just SO soft -- I recommend only ordering it in the Fall!
customer_reviews.author: Minx

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color but was quite disappointed when applying for only the second time the lipstick fell out of the holder and hit the floor. I had not even advanced the lipstick yet but when it turned over, out it fell. Appeared to be and issue in the manufacturing process. Cannot recommend as I did not wear it enough to be able to evaluate. Update 12/15. So I was contacted by the seller and they were lovely. Told me that they were going to send a replacement. That was very nice...never received a replacement. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Gailz

customer_reviews.title: Ogee Sculpted Tinted Lip Oil
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to receive this lipstick and I received it today. I purchased the Dahlia (Burgandy) and applied it. It is a deep, dark Burgandy, darker than on my laptop screen so I proceeded to blot some off to lighten. This worked to lighten it to a stained look; however, I suggest using a Lip Primer because this lipstick is very drying. It does not stay on too long, but leaves the lips stained, which looks kind of nice. It's not my favorite lipstick for the price :-(
customer_reviews.author: 2Puggles

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this
customer_reviews.text: I wear a mask all day at work and my lips were starting to show their age. (60 years) I needed something for grownups that really works. THIS IS IT and it is 100% worth the cost. I love the sensation of moisture I get when I apply and I love how beautiful my lips look. All my healthcare co-workers are getting this for their birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on the lips
customer_reviews.text: When I first applied the tinted Ogee it looked good. But within a very short period of time the color wore off. I've tried applying it under and over regular lipstick, but no matter what I do, the color wears off quickly. While the product feels good, there is no benefit to applying a tinted product instead of lipstick if it's going to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: FLBookworm

customer_reviews.title: Not pluming
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers are confused about what plumping means. Adds a great shine (which doesn't last), the shine may deflect light to appear plumping, however, no plumping effects what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieandRuby

customer_reviews.title: No color in Begonia; Zinnia not tomato red
customer_reviews.text: Maybe if you’re a blonde the Begonia shade will somewhat show up on you. But as a brunette it did absolutely nothing color wise. Waste of money. As for zinnia, they hedge their bets and say “rosy” and “tomato red”. There’s zero tomato red. It’s a raspberry red. Won’t be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice moisturizer, I smell mint of some kind but do not taste flavor. Very expensive for an "ok" product. I did order sheer blush so I expected a sheer color, but it doesn't seem to go in the color it appears. It just kind makes my lips look like I ate spicy food, which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: linda hicks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If this is what you get for $26....wish I would’ve read reviews before I got it, $26 would’ve went long way.... CVS got similar products for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lip Feel
customer_reviews.text: This is likely to be my Go-To lip product from here on out. It glides on so smoothly! The colors are gorgeous and stay true. I will say that for some of us older gals with lip lines, you may want to use a liner, as it tends to creep on some women I’ve spoken with (enthusiastically!) about this lipstick. Note that it is not a lip staining lipstick and will need reapplication after eating/drinking. Other than that, I found it stays on quite well. I highly recommend you buy at least one of these colors and see how you like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyd K.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes nicely. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the lipstick does not enter the lip lines above my lip. Although the advertisement says that if you prefer it darker, just add more, I found that wasn’t my experience. I ordered camellia which is a nice light pink but perhaps too light for me. This lipstick keeps my lips nicely moisturized. I like that there is no discernible perfumey smell. I will try another color.
customer_reviews.author: Deb chicago

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Magnolia MY FAVORITE on in this photo. This was taken just yesterday so it’s very recent. It does look prettier in person. It’s such a light pink that it’s Beautiful. It’s all I wear now, on my lips 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mary honiotes

customer_reviews.title: It delivers on all its promises!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh gee I ❤️ this lipstick! It does everything it promises, and we know that never happens. It stays on. It is moisturizing. The color is gorgeous. I want to order two more but can’t find my 10% off card—we will see if anyone really reads this! Take it from me you want this lipstick!
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Rosengren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not any better than a tinted chapstick. It does not stay on for any length of time. Will not purchase again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janis O

customer_reviews.title: Love Ogee's Lip Oils
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth and fifth color I have tried and other than Magnolia being too pale for me all by itself, I use it with Dahlia and Zinnia to give depth and for cheek color. I particularly like how these lip oils feel and the colors are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I (foolishly) believed the hype surrounding this product and purchased it. It’s ok. No more hydrating than Chapstick, imo. Save your money and stick to drugstore lip balms.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: No no
customer_reviews.text: I returned! Didn’t hold up to what was advertised -wore off quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sandy-Aston

customer_reviews.title: Looks like full tune of product for $30 when you only get and inch or so of product.
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing, smooth texture and nice aroma. Some other reviews said too little product for the cost. Misleading on quantity in tube. Some said only an inch of balm!?! Waste of plastic tubing if that is true. And too much money if that if the case. I have not used it enough to see amount of product. If that is the case I will return it for refund. I really like the color and feel of product but for a misleading quantity of balm it seems like poor representation.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: From the description I expected the color to stay on for hours. It did not. The color itself is not very vibrant. I would not purchase this item again. Too expensive and does not live up to the claims.
customer_reviews.author: Cate A

customer_reviews.title: wonderful lip moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said there is only 1/4 inch of this lip stick. It's not true -- you have to twist it (like any other lipstick). I've been using mine daily for over a month. I have bought several to give as Christmas gifts. I think the Azalea is the best color and has the most pigment. The Begonia is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane D Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive and does not live up to  description.
customer_reviews.text: This was not anything like it was described. The color was not like what is shown, understanding that any computer shown will be off some, it was way lighter and did not "build" like it says it should. Very expensive for what it doesn't do....I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Fox2star

customer_reviews.title: Natural high quality product from Vermont. Recommended by a colleague. You will never go back to chap stick again!
customer_reviews.text: Natural high quality product from Vermont. Recommended by a colleague. You will never go back to chap stick again! Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: erikaa

customer_reviews.title: Performs As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in Linnea. It's a shimmery peach color that really goes well with my skintone. It wears very nicely and doesn't feel like makeup. My lips tend to get dried out by many lipsticks and glosses, but this is very moisturizing. I love the tingle from the peppermint oil and the fact that it's organic.
customer_reviews.author: Alice T

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these lipsticks because of their promise to stay moist and not "bleed". While the colors are nice, the formula is no better than other much less expensive lipsticks. Within about an hour, the lipstick had bled beyond the lines of my lips. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love this lip oil
customer_reviews.text: After a friend gave me this lip oil to try I then ordered another because I love it! Linnea is a great color and I plan to try others. Finally, a lip color that doesn't make your lips feel dryer. I timed how long it stays on and was thrilled to have it last for almost two hours. I like the shimmery flecks, however I would suggest the manufacturers make these finer. I sometimes find them just above the lip line. Not a deal-breaker by any means, but appreciate a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick but
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the way it looks and feels on my lips. However, 2 of the 3 lipsticks I purchased broke off inside the applicator. Ogee is really good to respond quickly and to send a replacement. I’m so sad because I really like this lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Melody M.

customer_reviews.title: Smear proof lip oil
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent to this lip oil, which I think good. It doesn’t dry out my lips but doesn’t moisturize them either. It stays on my lips for longer that any other lip product I’ve used and doesn’t come off on my babies if I wait a few minutes to kiss them. It doesn’t Smear over my face when I eat or get on my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: The best lip oil/tint EVER! Refreshes your lips as it moisturizes and adds beautiful color at the same time. Does not bleed out. I’ve found that it works best if you use the clear stock first as a base then add your color on top it lasts longer and gives the best color. I’m hooked and have 4 different shades already❤️
customer_reviews.author: Janie Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is like a bag of chips... Huge bag, mostly air, maybe half full of what you’re actually wanting... I don’t get it. I feel a bit ripped off due to the minute size and broken stick, but the lip stuff itself is actually good. So torn about continuing to buy this.... I do think it’s way over priced for an inch and a half of product.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I really do love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this product! It feels so nice on and it has a really nice shine to it. I love that it’s organic. I would have given it fives stars if it would’ve lasted longer on my lips. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lynn

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I’m sensitive to lipsticks and their smell and feel. This Ogee brand is simply amazing, I love everything about them. You can apply a light coat or build it up to more intense color. Best of all I have zero reactions to the formula. I’ve purchased three colors and the clear and I’m happy with all of the. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Eames

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A Working LIP Rescue and Moisturiser!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical bc of the cost. I'd never thought I'd spend this much for basically a chapstick. This product is worth its weight in gold my lips were dry and cracking and hurt terribly when eating anything salty I even tried O'keeffe's hand cream, which didn't work on my lips, not surprised. I love this product and don't hesitate recommending it, even to ppl I don't know!
customer_reviews.author: Mary929W

customer_reviews.title: No fuss.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I think it was my mother's call in life to remind me that I need lipstick. I don't typically wear it because, the product feels too tacky and is very drying worse yet who has time for lip liner? One long lasting brand (I wont mention) practically seals my lips together and feels like superglue, but my Ogee is so soothing and leaves my lips in great shape. Double luck! Looks looks like I'm wearing lipstick and gets my mother off my case. ;)
customer_reviews.author: LAURA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Finally,  lip product that works.
customer_reviews.text: The Ogee sculpted lip oil is a real find for me. I have medicine induced dry mouth. I have tried many, many lip products. I have the clear ogee and one color. I love them both -- they provide a great deal of moisture with a balm effect. They do not run. Also, the color last. I will buy this product again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ncshopper

customer_reviews.title: Lip oil works!
customer_reviews.text: So far this lip oil has performed as described. I have enjoyed it and like this color except it is a bit too light. I plan to order another one with a little more color tint. I have noticed not the problem of cracking or peeling of my lips that I had before using this product. Thank you for making this product for us!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll

customer_reviews.title: Viola = Black Honey
customer_reviews.text: Viola is a nice dupe for Clinique's Black Honey. I was worried the shade would be too dark for my pale freckled skin tone. I have brown hair. Shade looks nice and is buildable. Formula is smooth and hydrating. Peppermint flavor/scent is present but not overpowering (not as strong as Burts Bees even). This does require reapplication every couple of hours, but I didn't need a mirror for that so this was easy. Price is a little steep, but it does appear to be quality pigment and ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for a lip gloss, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: It’s more than I typically pay for a lip gloss, but I think it’s very well worth it. It feels great on my lips, doesn’t dry them out like some lip glosses, and looks great under or over lipstick. I just bought another one because the first one lasted a goodly amount of time and it really is better than any other lip gloss products I’ve used before.
customer_reviews.author: fran r

customer_reviews.title: LIKE
customer_reviews.text: I like tis Ogee Tinted Lip Oil except for one small thing - as far as I can tell you can't sharpen and use whole pencil it is just product in the very top and once it starts to go down - as far as I know - the lipstick is gone so doesn't last overly long.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Not a good lip oil
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Ogee Tinted Lip Oil stick. It's like the first one. It dries my lips and has absolutely no color to it. So disappointed. I tried! It's a great idea but this product is not a good one. You would do better guying some Coconut oil and putting it straight on your lips. Sorry. Hate to be negative. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Burt's Bees
customer_reviews.text: Like, it's fine, but mostly just seems like an overpriced version of Burt's Bees tinted balms. I really don't see what's so special about this, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lip balm that moisturizes pretty well while it is on. It’s not long wearing but then, it is a balm. The color is pretty but it is a bit light in color for me. I like it well enough that I might consider purchasing another. I do prefer Bobbi Brown lip tint.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, color and scent!
customer_reviews.text: Great texture, color and scent! All things I typically struggle with when it comes to lip color and I usually just end up wearing lip balm of some sort. I'm excited to try more colors. I initially ordered the wrong color and they were super helpful in getting me the right one.
customer_reviews.author: M Pieske

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So I loved the color but all the hoopla on Facebook about this lipstick is just that hoopla! This is not worth $24. Sorry. I’ve bought $7-9 lipstick that stays on better.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta J

customer_reviews.title: Aweful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of seeing it on instagram. The description of the colors is very misleading. I never would have bought it if it was described as it really is, frosted & glittery! That does not look good on anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: love this item just wish they would add more color options
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it did not get 5 stars is because the color shown looks deeper and Browner than in person it's more of a coral Brown and I wish the company would make a true round tone but that has nothing to do with the seller or Amazon itself just my personal preference
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lipsticks. I bought the Zinnia and Azalea colors. They’re both perfect for everyday. This lipstick doesn’t feather on my 60plus lips. I love the consistency. It’s moisturizing but not too glossy. You do have to reapply after eating, but that’s with most lipsticks unless they feel like glue on your lips. They are pricey, but I think they’re worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: While the part about the product not bleeding is correct, it does not stay on long enough to moisturize. I talk all day as a teacher and I just don't have time to keep reapplying. Sort of bummed. Consolation? love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Getris-Utschig

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for so little lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: So expensive for a 1/4 of an inch of lipstick that doesn’t stay on, has very little color. Feels good on the lips but no worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Buxom and Moxie user but thought I’d try this. I was disappointed and don’t feel it is as good as advertised. It is moist initially but doesn’t last very long. The color okay but also didn’t last. Overall, for the price, I will stay with Bare Mineral products.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakkay

customer_reviews.title: Mosturizing Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would read more about the product before ordering one. It is definitely very moisturizing but I was looking for lip color that stays on and this product needed to be refreshed several times during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Betty L. Patti

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes well
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very smooth, keeps my lips moist. No scent or flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Micha

customer_reviews.title: Product is dull and flat.
customer_reviews.text: The color is flat. It has no life to it. I had to apply a clear gloss coat to perk it up. It also doesn't last too long. For the price, it's too much. I could do better with Cover Girl, Maybelline,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jasey Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and the subtle lip color. It's a lasting moisturization. I'm excited to try other ogee products!
customer_reviews.author: lloyd m.

customer_reviews.title: Lip color
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Product advertised for older skin like No feathering. Give it to the teenager is your family.
customer_reviews.author: kayrogers

customer_reviews.title: Light and lovely colors.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tinted lip oil, it feels very light and the colors are lovely. It goes on so smoothly, I can build the coverage and it is very moisturizing. I do think that my lips feel smoother and even slightly plumped after use. It is not very long lasting, but that is not an issue for me because I am seldom able to keep lipstick on for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Soft feel
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and carry it in my purse.I do not leave my purse in a hot place, but when I went to use as usual,it had broken off. The lipstick broke and was in the other end of tube, the top end. I smashed it back in, but it does not want to roll on right.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: The color was too light. I regret spending as much as I did for a product that I will never wear. I loved the feel of the product very much though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh.... not so great
customer_reviews.text: REALLY overpriced. Not sure why it’s called “oil”. I was expecting something moisturizing but this isn’t any better than the typical drug store stuff. I’ve been duped by marketing hype.
customer_reviews.author: lazyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear - this version is dry and the color is so-so.
customer_reviews.author: Forever Feral

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for several reasons. I love the thick pencil. It goes on nicely. I love the moisturizing effect. It’s not sticky like some products. It’s easy to apply. I’m not usually near a mirror or carrying one. I love this color because it’s subtle. I’m not into crazy or bright colored lipstick. It doesn’t bleed. I may buy another color for special nights out. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jpike

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating light tint
customer_reviews.text: Sheer style that doesn’t bleed and makes my lips feel protected. I prefer bold lipsticks in day and carmex balm for natural days. This is a nice option for natural days with a hint of color and keeps lips hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: WendiLouWho

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty. That is all I liked. I found this lipstick to be dry, not moist. The color lasted less than an hour. Hefty price - not worth half of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: I own 4 of these...
customer_reviews.text: And Begonia is my favorite color so far. I love that you can wear it light or apply it so the color is more intense. For a lip oil - it stays on my lips very well. Also leaves them nicely conditioned. Would like to see more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Rule

customer_reviews.title: Not hydrating Enough
customer_reviews.text: This product did leave behind as much hydration as I would have hoped for. It’s an oil so it makes your lips feel slippery, I prefer balms more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Color is so light, barely tell I have a lip color on so I still wear my other lip color over it. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Justus

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this at all. It stuck to my lips and I didn't like the way it felt.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: OMG why didnt I find this years ago
customer_reviews.text: I read about lip oil online somewhere and decided to try it. I saw that Agee was rated the best. Wow, I LOVE it. I'm going to try some colors too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
